Relation Back.definition: the assigning of a prior date
Relation Back.origin: [the relation back of amendments to the date of the original pleading]

1.1: the assigning of a prior date (as the date of execution of a document) to an act (as filing of a document and esp. a pleading) as the time of its effect esp. to avoid a time limit [the
1.relation back: of amendments to the date of the original pleading]

2.1: the legal fiction that an action (as the filing of a document) was taken on a previous date to avoid the expiration of a time limit
